title: 100 Years of Hollywood (Time-Life Art History Photo Ebook).pdf
description:
Pdf / English / 1999 Time Life / 192 pages / 31.6 MB

What a fun read this comprehensive retrospective study of the American movie industry. People, places, things, ideas galore along with fascinating black 'n white/color publicity and on-screen photos combine to tell the story of each and every facet of the most collaborative of art forms. To know where films have come in the 21st century, these almost 200 pages provide informative and interesting background. From Woody Allen through Adolph Zukor and Edison peep shows through Lucas blockbusters with everyone and everything in between, hooray for (100 Years of) Hollywood!

Amazon
